name: Fantastic Fetus 2020
description:
This is an interactive commentary to the game project Fantastic Fetus released in 2019. 

Fantastic Fetus is a pregnancy simulator in a Tamagotchi style. The player is taking care of a pregnant woman and create your dream fetus. The game is discussing the bill from 2016 that would introduce an abortion ban when a fetus has lethal aberrations in Poland.  

On the 22nd of October 2020, the Polish constitutional court introduces the law proposed in 2016. The Strajk Kobiet protests started the same day the law was changed. The march grew, and soon the whole country was filled with people protesting against the current government. 

Because the game from 2019 came to reality in 2020, we decided to create this additional content. 

If you haven't played the original Fantastic Fetus game, please feel free to do so here: cyangmou.itch.io/fantastic-fetus
